name: Kotak 811 Savings Account
offer_snippet: Open Zero Balance Savings Account Online in 3 Minutes | Kotak 811 | Kotak Mahindra Bank — Open Kotak 811 Zero Balance Savings Account online in 3 mins & enjoy 5.75% interest p.a. with ActivMoney. Get up to ₹6,000 cashbac
offers: Attractive interest rates Earn up to 5.75% p.a. with ActivMoney’s auto-sweep
Cashback rewards Up to ₹250 cashback on UPI transactions

Account flexibility: Either keep to the classic Zero Balance Account for the basics or opt for 811 Super Zero Balance Account to add benefits like higher cashback, cheque book access, and insurance that stretches wider.
100% online — no paperwork, no branch visits.
"Wow! Loving the Kotak811 zero balance account. They offer free & fast fund transfer option as well"

name: Kiwi (Credit on UPI)
offer_snippet: Kiwi: Your Virtual UPI Rupay Credit Card — With Kiwi, make credit card payments through UPI anywhere & everywhere
